name: Figma Wireframing Kit
description:
For the past few years I’ve done multiple low-fidelity wireframes and prototypes to test and present new ideas and flows, and with each iteration I’d polish and improve its visual components.


I gathered, organized and cleaned up all those components into this Figma Wireframing Kit, mostly for my own personal use, but I’m also sharing it with Figma’s Community in the hope it’ll help someone else kickstart their low-fidelity designs.


Features

  • Text Styles
  • Colors
  • Icons
  • Buttons & pills
  • Input Fields & Dropdowns
  • Checkboxes, Radio buttons & Toggles
  • Text tabs & Icon tabs
  • Device frames (iOS, Android & Web)


Feel free to reuse, iterate or even create your own kit based on this one.
